title: PM lauds security forces for their successful operations against terrorists
content:
ISLAMABAD, July 01 (APP): Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif on Monday appreciated the officers and jawans of Pakistan Army for their successful operations against terrorists in Tirah, District Khyber and District Lakki Marwat, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa.
The prime minister said that the security forces personnel with a display of valour had sent nine terrorists including some very dangerous and most wanted to hell, adding that the entire nation was proud of its brave jawans.
He also appreciated the unwavering resolve of the defenders of the country for peace in the country, PM Office Media Wing said in a press release.
The entire nation stood along with the brave jawans of Pakistan army to eliminate the specter of terrorism from the country, he added.
